test
Class CircleTest

java.lang.Object
  test.CircleTest

public class CircleTest
extends java.lang.Object

This class simulates the sigma-game on a circle. It tests the game for some values. The solution is not difficult, there exists always a solution if the number of nodes is divided by four.

Author:
Irene Thesing

Constructor Detail

CircleTest

Method Detail

createCircle

public static Game createCircle(int numKnots)
Creates a new circle game with the given number of nodes. Two neighbored nodes have an edge between them and every node has exactly two neighbors.

Parameters:
numKnots - count of nodes for the circle.
Returns:
the corresponding game on the circle.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Test method for the sigma-game on the circle. It tries some game sizes.

Parameters:
args - is not needed.
